about_the_game:
You command an immensely powerful Xalium Battle Tank (XBT) and the expert pilot who navigates it.

Battle Enemy Heroes Weaving Through Swarms of Minions:



With 100+ minions per team, per avenue, per minute, the battlefield is teeming with thousands. Whether you are obliterating minions in clusters, swarming heroes or overwhelming turrets, once you adapt to the this new scale of war, no other MOBA will compare.

Explore the Jungle Accomplishing Missions:



Danger and riches abound in the streets of Rotnor. The city is divided into two halves, each with four neighborhoods inhabited by neutral factions: police, military, pirates, and Xorm. Decide who to ally with, undertake missions for them, and secure vital upgrades that can shift the balance of power. Once you’re strong enough, rally your team to challenge mighty Mantis, the rogue XBT, for a reward that could change the outcome.

Enhance Your Build with Modifications and Upgrades:



Select the battle tank and pilot that align with your team role from an ever-growing pool of options. Every five levels, enhance your skills with modifications. Acquire upgrades to tailor your tank to your distinctive playing style.

Demolish Everything to Forge New Paths Reshaping the Map:



You’re piloting a battle tank in a city, with the power to destroy anything in your path. Create new routes between lanes through the jungle, ambush enemies from behind, or surprise them with backdoor attacks just when they think they’ve won.

name: Steel Swarm: APOCALYPSE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel 6th gen (Skylake) or Amd Ryzen 1st gen or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SSA is a next-gen MOBA: 5 vs 5 players fight in 3 lanes to destroy enemy HQ. Yet, SSA advances the genre: Battle enemy heroes weaving through swarms, explore the jungle accomplishing missions, enhance your build with mods and upgrades, and demolish the city to forge new paths altering the map.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish
